name: Dream Street Market
description:
You've drifted off and find yourself in a strange, yet all too familiar place... Welcome to Dream Street Market! This sprawling collection of vendors have bizarre items unlike any you've seen before. Make sure to collect the items that speak to you - it might be the last chance you ever get!

Dream Street Market is a procedurally-generated exploration and collectathon game created using Unity. This game was created by Joseph Horowitz, Shuyu Zhang, and William Lamkin as part of Carnegie Mellon University's Experimental Game Studio.

Assets from Everything Library © David OReilly
